title: [Luinne Bheinn, Outer Watch]
description: The mountainous path and its wavy granite surroundings are contrasted by the drab grain fields that lie to the north.  A few nocturnal birds circle the fields occasionally, perhaps eyeing either the grains or any small rodents that might be running around.
